title: Provide supporting material
caption: Respond to the tribunal
li1: you can upload letters, photos or documents to support your response
li2: if you are taking a picture of a letter, place it on a flat surface and take the picture from above
li3: if you are uploading written documents with tracked changes, make sure that tracked changes are turned on

responseText.hint: Use this box to provide any supporting material. You can also upload a file if you wish.

responseText.required: Use the text box or file upload to give details
responseText.tooLong: Give details (free text) must be entered as 2500 characters or less
